tinyfoRest 0.0.0.9000

    How to use the `tinyfoRest` package

    Get S2 Landcover

    get_s2_landcover.Rd

    Function to retrieve Sentinel-2 landcover data for a specified location and time period.

    Usage

    get_s2_landcover(
  tf_id = 85,
  lon = -0.25083,
  lat = 52.5739214,
  dist = 1000,
  start_date = "2023-01-01",
  end_date = "2023-09-01"
)

    Arguments

    tf_id

    Numeric ID associated with the training forest default = tf_id.

    lon

    Numeric, longitude coordinate of the location default = -0.250830.

    lat

    Numeric, latitude coordinate of the location default = 52.5739214.

    dist

    Numeric, buffer distance in meters around the location default = 1000.

    start_date

    Character string, start date of the time period in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format default = '2023-01-01'.

    end_date

    Character string, end date of the time period in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format default = '2023-09-01'.

    Examples

    ## Specify the tf_id
tf_id <- 85

## Specify the location coordinates
lon <- -0.250830
lat <- 52.5739214

## Specify the buffer distance
dist <- 1000

## Specify the time period
start_date <- '2023-01-01'
end_date <- '2023-09-01'

## Call the get_s2_landcover function
get_s2_landcover(tf_id = tf_id, lon = lon, lat = lat, dist = dist)
